channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Google Just Stuffed a Bunch of New AI Into Your Gmail
item.description: Heard you like inboxes. Well, you're getting an "AI Inbox" in your inbox.

item.title: Pour les geeks un peu nostalgiques, la console SNK Neo Geo Mini Japonaise avec 40 jeux est soldée à -40%
item.description: La nostalgie a le vent en poupe et les constructeurs le savent : c'est pourquoi vous retrouvez la SNK Neo Geo Mini Japonaise au format bartop sur le marché. En plus, elle est à 59,49 euros au lieu de 99,99 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Disney+ s’essaie à la vidéo verticale pour retenir ses abonnés
item.description: Disney+ n'est pas allé chercher très loin sa prochaine nouveauté : le service de streaming va en effet proposer des vidéos au format vertical histoire de faire mousser l'engagement des abonnés. Comme chez TikTok, Instagram, ou encore… Netflix.

item.title: TV makers are taking AI too far
item.description: This is Lowpass by Janko Roettgers, a newsletter on the ever-evolving intersection of tech and entertainment, syndicated just for The Verge subscribers once a week. Every year, TV makers flock to CES in Las Vegas to show off bigger, brighter, and better-looking displays. And every year, the same companies also use the show to throw […]

item.title: Amazon frappe fort pour le début des soldes d’hiver : les 10 deals Tech à retenir
item.description: Les soldes d’hiver viennent de débuter, et si Amazon n'indique pas clairement sa participation à l'événement, de nombreux produits Tech se trouvent à prix cassés chez le géant du e-commerce. L’occasion parfaite de s’équiper malin pour bien démarrer l'année 2026.

item.title: All the tech and gadgets announced at CES 2026
item.description: It's the first week of a new year and there's no time for the tech world to slowly ease back into things following the holidays. That's because CES 2026 is in full swing, with all manner of companies descending on Las Vegas to reveal their latest innovations and what they're planning to bring your way in the near future. Many of the Engadget crew are on the ground to check out as much of the new tech as possible. Of course, we're keeping tabs on all of the major CES press conferences too. Samsung held its First Look presentation, which focuses on home products, while LG has shown off a wide ar...

item.title: Who needs Black Friday? The AirPods Pro 3 plummet to a record-low price again
item.description: The Apple AirPods Pro 3 have dropped back to their lowest-ever price of $199.99 at Amazon.

item.title: US withdraws from internet freedom bodies it deems "wasteful, ineffective and harmful"
item.description: President Trump has signed an executive order withdrawing the country from key international internet freedom organizations, including the Freedom Online Coalition and Global Forum on Cyber Expertise.

item.title: Elon Musk’s lawsuit against OpenAI will face a jury in March
item.description: District Judge Yvonne Gonzalez Rogers said there was evidence suggesting OpenAI’s leaders made assurances that its original nonprofit structure would be maintained. The case will go to trial in March.

item.title: The Galaxy Watch 8 is TechRadar's best smartwatch of 2025 — and it's $70 off at Amazon
item.description: Samsung's Galaxy Watch 8 is our best smartwatch of the year, and Amazon has a $70 discount right now, bringing the price down to $279.99.

item.title: Claude Code 2.1.0 arrives with smoother workflows and smarter agents
item.description: Anthropic has released Claude Code v2.1.0, a notable update to its "vibe coding" development environment for autonomously building software, spinning up AI agents, and completing a wide range of computer tasks, according to Head of Claude Code Boris Cherny in a post on X last night.The release introduces improvements across agent lifecycle control, skill development, session portability, and multilingual output — all bundled in a dense package of 1,096 commits. It comes amid a growing wave of praise for Claude Code from software developers and startup founders on X, as they increasingly use th...

item.title: Best Buy's New Year gaming laptop deals offer up to $650 off RTX 5060 and RTX 5070 models this week
item.description: Don't miss Best Buy's excellent New Year sale if you're on the lookout for a seriously cheap premium gaming laptop.

item.title: Bruxelles et Londres se penchent sur Grok après la génération d’images sexuelles, y compris d’enfants
item.description: Les ennuis s'accumulent pour Grok, xAI, X/Twitter et Elon Musk. La facilité avec laquelle le bot IA génère et diffuse des images sexuellement explicites, y compris d'enfants, provoque la mobilisation de la Commission européenne et du régulateur britannique.

item.title: Tom Cruise Helped Shoot a Lightsaber Duel for ‘Star Wars: Starfighter’
item.description: An unlikely source gives us an intriguing new detail about Shawn Levy's new 'Star Wars' movie.

item.title: Honor steps up to the big leagues with the Magic 8 Pro
item.description: I have a simple gut check I use when reviewing phones, especially ones that rely on their cameras as a selling point: how often do I wish I had another phone with me instead? These days, it's mostly the Vivo X300 Pro I miss when I'm testing something else, a phone whose camera remains unmatched. […]

item.title: Is this the world’s first solid-state battery?
item.description: CES is a land of bold announcements of amazing, innovative products and technologies that will revolutionize the world, often set for release in two years' time. Twenty-four months seems to be about the right hype window: close enough to generate excitement and investment, but far enough that everyone forgets about your promises before that deadline […]...

item.title: How to watch The Hunting Party season 2 — stream online from anywhere in the world
item.description: NBC’s manhunt thriller returns as Bex Henderson’s team pursues the fugitives of 'The Pit'

item.title: Holographic AI is going to happen. But this bizarre ‘friend in a jar’ is not it
item.description: Humans want to personify AI. Razer’s new ‘holographic’ companion is a crude step toward that future. Gaming peripheral company Razer is betting that people want AI holograms. So much so that it introduce a perplexing new product at CES 2026 that early critics have dubbed a “friend in a bottle.” Project AVA, is a small glass cylinder that features a 5.5-inch animated desk buddy that can interact with you, coach you, or offer gaming advice on demand—all powered by xAI’s Grok....

item.title: Gmail’s new inbox is the ultimate gateway drug to AI
item.description: The world’s largest email service just initiated step one in a larger plan to secure Google as your favorite AI platform. Gmail was always a gateway drug for the greater Google ecosystem. When it launched in 2004, Gmail stood out by offering then-wild amounts of storage for free. Despite few updates to its design in two decades, it now boasts 2.5 billion users and is the largest email service in the world....

item.title: Nintendo is bringing its cute My Mario collection to the US next month
item.description: After exclusively launching in Japan last August, Nintendo has announced its My Mario product line will be available in the US starting next month. That includes the interactive Hello, Mario! app featuring an interactive 3D version of Mario's head that reacts to being poked, tugged, and flung around the screen. The app will be available […]

item.title: Boulanger brade un tas de produit Tech durant les soldes d’hiver : voici le TOP 15 des deals à saisir
item.description: Pour le lancement des soldes d’hiver 2026, Boulanger propose de fortes remises sur de nombreux produits Tech. L’enseigne dégaine ses meilleures offres pour faire de bonnes affaires pour ce début d'année 2026. Nous avons fait le tri pour vous !

item.title: Ce rover de la Nasa vient d’envoyer l’une des plus belles images jamais prises sur Mars
item.description: Depuis les flancs du mont Sharp, sur Mars, le rover Curiosity a capturé un panorama saisissant où les lumières du matin et de l’après-midi se répondent. Derrière ces couleurs se cache un paysage clé pour comprendre l’histoire de l’eau sur la Planète rouge.

item.title: Microsoft could reveal its OEM Xbox PC this year according to 'credible rumors'
item.description: A new report from Windows Central claims that Microsoft could unveil the first look at its new Xbox hardware this year, which would include an OEM "Xbox" PC.

item.title: Remplacer la RAM ou le SSD de son PC portable : en 2026, la réparabilité fait son grand retour sur PC
item.description: Une tendance se dégage des constructeurs de PC au CES 2026 : la réparabilité devient le nouvel argument de vente des géants de l’informatique. Entre le programme "Space Frame" de Lenovo et la mue des Dell XPS, le PC portable de demain ne se jette plus : il se répare. Mais à quel prix ?

item.title: Dell unveils a massive 52-inch 6K ultrawide curved monitor at CES 2026
item.description: PC and gaming monitors are among the CES 2026 announcements, and Dell may just have one of the most impressive. The company launched an ultrawide, curved 52-inch 6K monitor at the show this year, a productivity behemoth designed for stock traders, engineers and other professionals. Dell claims the UltraSharp 52 Thunderbolt Hub Monitor is the first 52-incher to market that’s also ultrawide, curved and supports 6K resolution (but with that many qualifiers almost anything can be a world first).Given Dell’s experience in the monitor realm, this could be a dream display for professionals who handle...

item.title: AI-powered health gadgets at CES 2026 are concerning experts. Here’s why
item.description: During the show in Las Vegas, the FDA announced that it will ease regulations on wellness products such as heart monitors. Health tech gadgets displayed at the annual CES trade show make a lot of promises. A smart scale promoted a healthier lifestyle by scanning your feet to track your heart health, and an egg-shaped hormone tracker uses AI to help you figure out the best time to conceive.Tech and health experts, however, question the accuracy of products like these and warn of data privacy issues — especially as the federal government eases up on regulation.The Food and Drug Administration an...

item.title: The best sleep tech doesn’t cancel noise
item.description: Follow the science to understand how passive noise blocking and noise-masking audio create a truly restful environment.

item.title: Gemini débarque dans Gmail : c’est la fin de votre boîte de réception telle que vous la connaissiez
item.description: Google intègre plus profondément Gemini à Gmail pour faire de votre boîte de réception un véritable assistant personnel. On fait le point sur les trois fonctionnalités majeures qui font changer votre façon d'utiliser Gmail.

item.title: Long unskippable ads will reportedly be illegal in one country next month
item.description: There's one country reportedly taking a stand against the scourge of unskippable ads.

item.title: The gaming monitors that caught our eye at CES 2026
item.description: CES 2026 has been a big event for screens of all sizes: TVs, laptops and everything in between. New PC monitors are among the CES announcements, with several companies are using the trade show as an opportunity to update their gaming monitor lineups. Some companies are showing off expanded OLED panels with improved refresh rates, brightness and color production, while others are showing off weirder ideas like a glasses-free 3D monitor. The collection below are some of our favorite gaming monitors that have already been announced: LG UltraGear GX7LG's latest QHD OLED gaming monitor is its brigh...

item.title: The next Xbox Developer Direct showcase is on January 22
item.description:
Xbox will kick off the fourth installment of its Developer Direct event on January 22 at 1PM ET. As usual, we'll get a glimpse at what the upcoming year has in store along with news, new gameplay footage and more directly from the teams behind this year's slate of games. It's officially Developer_Direct season!Join us on January 22 at 10am PT for an exclusive look at Fable, Forza Horizon 6, and Beast of Reincarnation: https://t.co/FvFUT7RzVZ | #DeveloperDirect pic.twitter.com/GMRpVDxucs— Xbox (@Xbox) January 8, 2026
In a blog post announcing the event, Xbox Wire Editor-in-Chief Jon Skrebels s...

item.title: Fnac et Darty se montrent bien généreux lors des soldes : les 20 deals qui valent le coup

item.title: The Ecovacs Deebot T50 Omni robot vacuum and mop is down to its best price ever
item.description: The Ecovacs Deebot T50 Omni robot vacuum and mop is down to $449 at Amazon. That's over 30% off and its best price on record.

item.title: Acer a répondu à l’une de mes obsessions : les noms indigestes de produits
item.description: Les noms des écrans de PC sont souvent incompréhensibles. Acer travaille sur le sujet.

item.title: Cdiscount se démarque en multipliant les codes promos pour les soldes : le TOP 10 des offres à retenir
item.description: Les soldes d’hiver sont aussi chez Cdiscount, et c’est le moment idéal pour craquer sur un nouveau produit Tech sans se ruiner. En plus des remises déjà généreuses, l’e-commerçant ajoute deux codes promo exclusifs pour faire encore baisser la note. On vous a sélectionné les meilleures offres à ne surtout pas manquer.

item.title: CES 2026 live updates: See the latest news, surprises, and strange tech from LG, Samsung, Lego, and new startups
item.description: CES 2026 is finally here, and Mashable reporters are on the ground looking for the best in show. Get live updates from the showroom floor and behind the scenes.

item.title: Adieu la panne de batterie : pour 310 euros, ce smartphone musclé promet 2 jours d’autonomie
item.description: Le Poco M8 Pro 5G vient d'être annoncé et il ne fait pas dans la demi-mesure. Avec sa batterie monstrueuse de 6 500 mAh et son écran 1,5K, il veut mettre tout le monde d'accord sur le milieu de gamme.

item.title: Votre Pixel 10 est instable après cette mise à jour ? Pas de panique, voici la solution
item.description: Il semble que la dernière mise à jour en apparence anodine proposée sur Android pose des soucis à certains modèles de Pixel 10.

item.title: Neige et verglas : cette ville peut « fermer les routes en un clic » sur Waze pour vous sauver
item.description: Pour éviter le chaos de la neige, la ville d'Orsay a une arme secrète. Grâce à un partenariat avec Waze, la mairie peut fermer virtuellement des rues et guider les automobilistes vers des refuges.

item.title: The most popular games are getting harder and harder to usurp
item.description: It's harder than ever for a new video game to crack the top of the most-played list. According to the Circana Player Engagement Tracker and video game market analyst Mat Piscatella, in 2025, the top five most-played games on PS5 and Xbox… were the same in 2024. And they likely won't be changing anytime soon. […]

item.title: AI factories are the foundation for enterprise-scale AI
item.description: The next phase of AI growth will be driven by the maturity of the underlying infrastructure.

item.title: Ozempic Quitters Pay a Heavy Price, Research Shows
item.description: People taking an obesity drug typically regain weight, a new review finds, often even quicker than people who lose weight through lifestyle changes alone.

item.title: Roblox rolls out mandatory age verification for chat features globally
item.description: If you want to chat on Roblox, get your ID ready. The platform is expanding mandatory age verification globally, raising new questions about data privacy and user safety.

item.title: Save $325 on the DJI Osmo Pocket 3 Creator Combo — the best price ever on a vlogging camera
item.description: As of Jan. 8, get the DJI Osmo Pocket 3 vlogging camera for just $654. That saves you over $300 on the device, bringing it down to its lowest price ever. Plus, this combo includes a wireless mic.

item.title: Google set to reduce the Android source code releases to just twice a year
item.description: Google will only publish AOSP source code 2x/year, not 4x/year - no changes to actual OS development.

item.title: Your data’s where, exactly? SMEs and data sovereignty
item.description: Where does your SME data really live? Sovereignty, resilience, and contracts now demand precise, provable answers.

item.title: Smart Play : LEGO promet de ne pas tourner le dos aux briques classiques
item.description: Malgré l'annonce de la plateforme Smart Play, LEGO n'a pas l'intention d'abandonner ce qui fait son succès depuis des décennies : la bonne vieille briquette en plastique. La nouvelle offre interactive « son et lumière » est complémentaire, affirme le géant danois du jouet.

item.title: You can score a refurbished Sonos Arc SL soundbar for just $320
item.description: Woot has an excellent deal on refurbished Sonos Arc SL soundbars, the 2020 model that’s similar to the original Arc aside from not having any microphones. It debuted for $749, but you can get one with a one-year Sonos warranty for $319.99 while supplies last. If this discount doesn’t sell out quickly (which it may), […]

item.description: Sam Rockwell plays a laid back timetraveler who enlists a bunch of randos to save the world from our codependency of computers.

item.title: CES 2026: Uncomfortable truths facing media and marketing
item.description: Why the brands that win in 2026 won’t be the loudest, but the most intentional As CES 2026 gets underway, Havas Media Network North America is publishing its 2026 Predictions Forecast, outlining the forces we believe will define the year ahead and separate brands that grow from those that fade. This perspective is drawn directly from that report and grounded in what leaders are seeing, discussing, and debating in Las Vegas this week. ...

item.title: The PC market braces for an AI-driven storm
item.description: The personal computer has remained surprisingly resilient to change over the past 15 years. Apple promised a "post-PC" era with the iPad in 2010 and failed to deliver one. Smartphones even overtook laptops as the most popular device to connect to the internet a decade ago, but millions of people still kept buying PCs every […]

item.title: U.S. is withdrawing from 66 international organizations, Trump memo reveals
item.description: The U.N. Framework Convention on Climate Change is part of the list of 35 non-U.N. groups and 31 U.N. entities. U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday that the United States would withdraw from dozens of international and U.N. entities, including a key climate treaty and a U.N. body that promotes gender equality and women’s empowerment, because they “operate contrary to U.S. national interests.”...

item.title: Why this VC thinks 2026 will be ‘the year of the consumer’
item.description: AI adoption in enterprise is stalling as companies don't know where to start. Vanessa Larco of Premise VC thinks 2026 will be the year of the consumer.

item.title: Astronomers Discover Unusual Asteroid Spinning Faster Than Anything Its Size
item.description: Way out there in the asteroid belt is an object that's spinning so fast, scientists are surprised it hasn't flown apart.

item.title: Bose is open-sourcing its old smart speakers instead of bricking them
item.description: In a surprisingly user-friendly move, Bose has announced it will be open-sourcing the API documentation for its SoundTouch smart speakers, which were slated to lose official support on February 18th, as reported by Ars Technica. Bose has also moved that date back to May 6th, 2026. When cloud support ends, an update to the SoundTouch […]
